Articles.Content:
Hey!

I just saw everyone trying 0.21 out and went to steam right away to check if I had the update.

To my surprise there were no updates available.

Is it not available on steam or is it not available for linux yet? (Yes I'm one of those annoying Linux users).

Thanks!

Wait what?

0.21 is in development, 0.20 is the current version?

It is not out yet

For linux, windows, steam, official site, anywhere, not out yet.

EDIT: Or is it?
.21 isn't out yet. To my knowledge.
I thought we were all still on 0.20.2
I guess ricotero saw the 0.20.1 threads from a while back, we are on 0.20.2 now.
False alarm everyone, go back to your homes.

False alarm everyone, go back to your homes.

Go back to our homes?!? How can you be serious? There's a time traveler loose on these very forums, and you want us to ignore it?

Please, oh time-traveled poster, tell us what the future holds.

(And next time, download KSP before you go back in time.)

Sorry... I saw this and thought it was already out...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content.php/184
According to the KSP Facebook page, the .21 update is in the quality assurance phase. Don't know what stage that Is but it sounds close to release.

According to the KSP Facebook page, the .21 update is in the quality assurance phase. Don't know what stage that Is but it sounds close to release.

Probably means they are testing it out before releasing to get rid of major or common bugs.

Can't wait to get my hands on the new update
Man, this title took 3 years off my life. My soul died a little bit as the thread unfolded!
Lol, if .21 was released right now then... Bugs and glitches guaranteed, and more!

I had a mini heart-attack when I read the title.

I know, I know... 0.21 will be out SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢

To avoid further confusion, I am closing this topic.

http://kerbaldevteam.tumblr.com/post/53972120537/squad-has-announced-ksp-0-21-has-entered-qa-testing

As posted by Squad, update 0.21 is in testing phase ONLY. It has not been released in any format.

Please feel free to continue discussing the update here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/37389-UNOFFICIAL-FANMADE-0-21-Discussion-thread
